slide 11 to 14 of 6

meet the Mayor

Welcome to the Township of Egg Harbor. The Township is The Heart of Atlantic County, a large and diverse community, that provides great amenities and services.  The Township Committee and I welcome your input and assistance as we govern this great Township together.
-Mayor Pfrommer Read More
Township of Egg Harbor 3515 Bargaintown Road Egg Harbor Township, NJ 08234
